programme.title: Five Superfighters
programme.desc: In John Lo Mar's masterpiece, an old medicine seller and his three apprentices learn Chinese, crane, pole, and drunken fighting to defeat an arrogant bully.

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: Vividly capturing fire's raging power, this tale revolves around a dutiful, yet indifferent fireman who risks his lives for others, yet can't handle his own.

programme.title: The Enchantress
programme.desc: A wanna-be-detective/swordsman gets more than he bargained for when investigating the disappearance of some martial artists.

programme.title: The Magic Blade
programme.desc: In this wuxia film, two rival swordsmen vie with a power-hungry villain to possess the dangerous 'Peacock Dart'.

programme.title: Godfather of Canton
programme.desc: When Commissioner Liu Ta-hua is arrested by special envoy Cheng for corruption, see how Lin, a coolie is unwittingly fated to play a role in his release.

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Loosely based on Louis Cha's classics, this rom com is about a power struggle between a Queen's treasonous lover and a princess amid slapstick battles and musical numbers.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: After his incarceration, a former boxer learns that his wife has passed away, leaving behind a sick daughter. To get her to undergo treatment, he agrees to step into the ring again.

programme.title: Three
programme.desc: Directed by Johnnie To, this action-thriller depicts how a doctor, a cop & a corned thug trigger a vicious cycle fueled by bad decisions & conflicting desires.

programme.title: Queen of Triads
programme.desc: A young innocent girl is betrayed by her loved ones & decides to take control of her life by becoming a gangster. Starring China's famed actors, Raquel Xu & Emotion Cheung.

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers
programme.desc: As the Tang Dynasty declines, several rebel groups are established, with the largest being the House of Flying Daggers. Two officers are ordered to kill the elusive leader of the group.

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: Based on a true story, a girl named Suki aspire to fulfill her dream after leaving with her cheating boyfriend. Later, when invited to attend his wedding, she schemes to have her revenge.

programme.title: The Golden Monk
programme.desc: Starring Ryan Zheng & Kitty Zhang, this magnificent film with incredible special effects depicts the reincarnation of Crouching Tiger Arhat, who descends into the human world to defeat demons.

programme.title: Love Revolution
programme.desc: Shortlisted at the 9th Okinawa International Movie Festival, Sam Lee's action romance depicts a spirited woman who sets out to rescue her dope-running boyfriend, when he is kidnapped in Thailand.

programme.title: As Tears Go By
programme.desc: Wah and Fly are cousins and best buddies but Wah is hesitant to maintain their relationship as he is involved with the mob. Then, Fly offended a mob boss one day, forcing Wah to interfere.

programme.title: League of Gods
programme.desc: Jet Li, Tony Leung, Fan Bing Bing, Louis Koo, Huang Xiaoming, Angelababy & other big stars in this epic action-fantasy based on the novel, Fengshen Yanyi

programme.title: Let Me Eat Your Pancreas
programme.desc: When a geeky teen librarian stumbles upon the secret terminal illness of his popular classmate, he slowly begins to help her achieve her bucket list. Simultaneously, she draws him out of his shell.

programme.title: Foolish Plan
programme.desc: Lam Chi Chung from Shaolin Soccer delivers another wildly nonsensical Hong Kong comedy with rock singer Shin as a crazy soccer team captain who pushes his team to victory!

programme.title: The Sinking City : Capsule Odyssey
programme.desc: A group of people fight for their ideal lifestyles as they share a small living space called "Space Capsule". Starring Pakho Chao, Louis Cheung & Andrew Lam.

programme.desc: This time on Halal Maps, we hit the streets to fill our rumbling stomachs with the mouthwatering tastes of Cambodia.

programme.title: Mat Salleh Cari Makan Ep12
programme.desc: Ikuti pengembaraan Rhys William dalam menjejaki hidangan tradisi di Negeri Pahang Darul Makmur. Menikmati makanan lazat yang sinonim dengan penduduk tempatan. Di Mi Ikan patin Temerloh dan Sambal Petai

programme.title: A Conversation with SHY Ep08
programme.desc: Episod kali ini SHY dan selebriti undangan, Daphne Iking dan Sheahnee Lee berbincang tentang hak asasi wanita sebagai seorang anak, isteri, ibu dan sebagai ahli dalam sebuah komuniti.

programme.title: Journey of Love Ep03
programme.desc: Amar and Amyra berkongsi pengalaman menziarahi kawasan dalam Masjid Nabawi. Mereka juga berkongsi pengajaran dari kisah-kisah sejarah yang diceritakan oleh Mutawif yang terkesan di hati mereka.

programme.title: Perfect Partner Ep03
programme.desc: Do you believe in Soulmates? Have you ever wondered what is love? Is there such a thing as a perfect partner? Find out more on this episode of Perfect Partners with Ustaz Mizi and Ustazah Liyana.

programme.title: Rasapedia Ep10
programme.desc: The host visits Sukabumi, a city in West Java. She tries Pak Mamat Soup, a famous soup that has been around for 3 generations. She also tries other dishes such as Abon Urap, Soto Mie and Mie Kocok.

programme.title: Awak Kat Mana? Ep13
programme.desc: Tanpa mengetahui ke mana destinasi yang dituju, tanpa wang dan telefon bimbit, 26 selebriti menyahut cabaran di Eropah untuk memenangi wang tunai sebanyak RM10 ribu. Dihoskan oleh Nabila Huda.

programme.title: GoShop
programme.desc: Rancangan yang memberi informasi mengenai pelbagai produk yang boleh didapati di Go Shop.

programme.title: Ramadan In The Islamic World Ep11
programme.desc: Bulan suci Ramadan di Kazakhstan mempunyai daya tarikan istimewa dengan keterujaan rakyat mereka menyambut bulan suci itu untuk berpuasa, melakukan ibadah dan berkumpul dengan ahli keluarga tercinta.

programme.title: Perang Periuk Ep04
programme.desc: Minggu ini, resepi keluarga dipertaruhkan dalam usaha Puan Susanti menambat hati sang suami. Puan Jamilah tidak mengalah walaupun tidak boleh berdiri lama untuk memasak.

programme.title: Mat Salleh Cari Makan Ep12

programme.title: Resipi Nenek Ep07

programme.title: Perang Periuk Ep05
